name: Wax Seal Initial Necklace // Sterling Silver Monogram Charms // Soho
description:
My handcrafted Wax Seal style Monogram Initial charms are made of recycled sterling silver.  Each delightful charm is made one at a time with a whimsical stamped letter insignia.

The charms are approximately 15mm and come with a 17" blackened sterling silver chain with sterling lobster clasp.

Choose your letter when you check out.   Please allow 5-10 for your custom charm necklace to be created and shipped to your doorstep.


All Mossy Creek jewelry is packaged in eco-friendly gift boxes.


✿¸.•*¨`*•..¸✿ ✿¸.•*¨`*•..¸✿

name: Pave Diamond Star Earrings with White Topaz
description:
Genuine Diamonds are set in sterling silver to create this wonderful pair of Diamond Pave charms. The charms dangle below White Topaz gemstones delicately wrapped in sterling silver.

I have used sterling silver Leverback ear wires so you never have to worry about losing one of your sparkling diamond charms.

Total length 2.75 inches.



✿¸.•*¨`*•..¸✿ ✿¸.•*¨`*•..¸✿

name: Sterling Silver Hoop Earrings :  Ruff Hewn
description:
Hand forged sterling silver hoops... triple ringlets hammered and textured for a rustic finish.

Polished sterling silver components.

1.5 inch drop.

Your custom hoop earrings will be made to order and will ship in 3 to 5 business days.

name: Pave Diamond Disc Charm :
description:
Genuine Pave Diamond Disc Pendant

This 13mm disc is loaded with Genuine sparkling Diamonds artistically set in sterling silver.

Your pave diamond disc will come with my favorite sterling silver rolo chain which has a brushed patina. The chain sparkles with the bits of polished silver and is a perfect, simple way to display your new pendant.

Yay for Pave!

17 inches.


All Mossy Creek jewelry is packaged in eco-friendly, recycled paper gift boxes.


✿¸.•*¨`*•..¸✿ ✿¸.•*¨`*•..¸✿

name: Pave OM Charm Necklace : Practice Love
description:
Genuine diamonds are set in sterling silver to create this stunning Pave OM Charm. 

Its such a beautiful piece, just lovely by itself or for layering

This genuine diamond Pave measures 20x15mm and dangles from a sterling silver chain that has a brushed blackened patina.

This 17 inch necklace closes with a sterling silver lobster clasp. 2 fine silver beads on either side of the clasp.

All Mossy Creek jewelry is made by me from start to finish in my home studio using the finest materials. Thank you supporting handmade!


Mossy Creek jewelry is packaged in eco-friendly, recycled paper gift boxes.


✿¸.•*¨`*•..¸✿ ✿¸.•*¨`*•..¸✿

name: Merlot Garnet and Pave Diamond Bracelet : Rock On
description:
A stunning genuine diamond Pave Star charm garnishes a gorgeous strand of 6mm AAA Merlot Garnets. 

The charm measures 15 x 15mm with diamonds set in sterling silver. The silver has highly polished patina. The charm is encased between 2 artisan sterling silver spacers.

The AAA garnets are a rich merlot and almost have a chocolaty color. The 6mm size creates a sleek bracelet with a modern feel. 

Approximately 7.25 inches.

name: Sterling Silver Studs : Ancient Coins
description:
Simple everyday studs made with recycled sterling silver embossed with an ancient design.  

These eco friendly droplets have been textured, and oxidized and polished, leaving the recessing blackened to highlight the design.

Approximately 7mm. Sterling Silver posts. Sterling wing nuts.

Your custom made post earrings will take approximately 3-5 days to make and be ready to ship.

name: Sterling Silver Charm Necklace : Ancient Coin
description:
A sweet little sterling silver charm that might be an ancient coin or symbol, is entirely made by hand. Oxidized and polished, this rustic charm measures approximately .5" in diameter and dangles from one of my favorite romantic sterling silver chains.

Simple silver necklace, an every day basic essential. Wear this one solo or add layers!

17 inches.

name: Rune Charm Necklace : Elder Futhark
description:
A rustic Futhark rune charm made of recycled sterling silver is has been finished by hand for a rustic ancient flavor.

Each tag is made by hand, a series of steps that are lovingly accomplished to create this aged patina finish.

The entire Elder Futhark alphabet is available - choose your favorite when you check out.

Please allow 5-10 business days for your one of a kind rune necklace to be made and ready to ship.  Expect little variations in each one.

All Mossy Creek jewelry is packaged in eco-friendly gift boxes.

name: Sterling Silver Hoop Earrings :  Satellite
description:
Hammered ringlets of recycled sterling silver are textured with several different hammers for a unique finish, and oxidized and brushed for a rustic flair. 

The ringlets dangle freely from my custom French ear wires, also of recycled sterling silver.

Super lightweight and easy to wear. Nice movement when worn.

Total length from top to bottom is 1.25 inches.

Your custom earrings will take approximate 3-5 days to make.   Please expect slight variations as each pair are made one at time and each pair is unique.

name: Sterling Silver Stacking Rings :  Short Stack
description:
Basic Essentials....

This listing is for ONE sterling silver stacking ring.

Each ring offered here is textured, filed by hand, oxidized and polished for a beautiful rustic finish.

Choose the style you love from the drop down box at check out.

4 styles are available. From top to bottom (1st photo):

Silk
Basket
Nature 
Bamboo

name: Sterling Silver Hoop Trio :  Endless Summer
description:
A trio of hammered ringlets are textured with several different hammers for a unique finish, oxidized and brushed for a rustic flair. 

Each hoop is securely soldered one to another. 

Long French style ear wires nicely offset the length of the hoops.

Super lightweight and easy to wear. Nice movement when worn.

Total length from top to bottom is 2 inches.

Your hoops will be made to order.   Expect slight variations with each piece - they're handmade!   Please allow 3-5 days for me to make your earrings and get them ready to ship.

name: Large Sterling Silver Hoops : Boho Luxe
description:
Super Boho oversized Hoops in sterling silver with rustic hammered texture and brushed patina.

Surprisingly lightweight and easy to wear shoulder dusters.

Length from top to bottom is 3.75 inches.

Width of the largest hoop is 1.5 inches.

Made to order - please allow 3-5 days for your handmade order to be ready to ship.

name: Turquoise Ring :  Nashville!
description:
I love Nashville!   I love the town, the vibe, the ladies wearing cowgirl boots in the summer time, and of course, the music!   

Its a swinging town with friendly folk and old neighborhoods with amazing homes....   I can drive around looking for hours.

I created this ring with the spirit of Nashville in mind.   A little southern fried rock, a little country flavor, and down home goodness.

A robin egg blue Kingman Turquoise oval is set in fine silver and rests on simple hammered band of sterling silver.

Stone measures approximately 10mm x 22mm.

Whole half and quarter sizes 7 to 10.   Please leave your ring size in the comments when you check out.   Feel free to contact me if you have any questions.

name: Lapis Lazuli Bracelet with Pave Diamond Star : Rock Star
description:
Starring 8mm Indigo Blue Lapis Lazuli.  A favorite since the beginning of time, this classic gemstone is a worthy companion for this genuine diamond Pave charm.   

Charm measures 15x15mm with diamonds set in sterling silver.

This stretch bracelet comes in a standard 7.25 length which fits most.   If you prefer a different size, or would like to have this bracelet restrung with a sterling silver clasp, please get in touch.

name: Recycled Silver Vintage Letterpress Monogram Necklace
description:
Whimsical initial insignia stamped onto pure recycled silver.   

Each charm is stamped using a vintage metal letterpress and measures on average 1/2 inch.  

A light patina highlights the indention, polished to a satin shine. 

Each charm is made by hand, one at a time.  Please allow for slight variations.   Processing time for this made to order item is 5-10 business days.   You will receive a shipping confirmation when your order is ready.   Always feel free to contact me in the meantime.

Your charm comes with a 17" sterling silver chain with sterling lobster clasp.  

I add a patina to the chain and then lightly brush for a rustic, modern look.   If you prefer a polished silver chain - just leave me a note when you check out.


All Mossy Creek jewelry is packaged in eco-friendly gift boxes.

name: Pave Diamond Star Necklace : Silver Star
description:
Genuine diamonds are set in sterling silver to create this stunning Star pendant. This 15mm diamond charm dangles from a sterling silver Rolo chain that has brushed blackened patina.

This 17 inch necklace closes with a sterling silver lobster clasp. 2 fine silver beads on either side of the clasp.

All Mossy Creek jewelry is made by me from start to finish in my home studio using the finest materials. Thank you supporting handmade!


All Mossy Creek jewelry is packaged in eco-friendly, recycled paper gift boxes.


✿¸.•*¨`*•..¸✿ ✿¸.•*¨`*•..¸✿

name: Dotted Hoop Earrings :  Sweet Jane
description:
Large, sparkling polished sterling silver hoops dangle from lightly forged sterling silver ear wires.

Soft sway and gentle dangle. If you haven't tried these dangling hoops yet - you should! The hoops hang just below the ear lobe and offer a little bit more movement. 

1.75 inch hoops, drop a total of 2.25 inches. Very light weight. 

Long French ear wires with a light patina, for a rustic contrast.

Made to order - please allow 3 to 5 business days for your hoop earrings to ship.

name: Amethyst and Topaz Cluster Bracelet : Posh
description:
Very posh and urbanly chic...

Stunning combination of mystic purple Amethyst and blue Topaz gemstones, strung together to create this very feminine sparkling cluster bracelet. Plump onion cut gemstones in blue and purple create a sparkling gemstone bracelet with a modern tennis bracelet style.

Approximately 7.5 inches and sized perfectly for most wrist sizes. 


All Mossy Creek jewelry is packaged in eco-friendly, recycled paper gift boxes

name: Pave Diamond Star Necklace : Lucky Star
description:
Genuine diamonds are set in sterling silver to create this stunning Star. This 15mm diamond charm dangles from gold filled chain garnished with hammered sterling silver dangles.

The links of gold filled chain are then linked to a blackened sterling silver Rolo chain, with 2 fine silver beads wrapped in gold on either side.

This 17 inch necklace closes with a sterling silver lobster clasp. 2 fine silver beads on either side of the clasp.

All Mossy Creek jewelry is made my me from start to finish in my home studio using the finest materials. Thank you supporting handmade!


All Mossy Creek jewelry is packaged in eco-friendly, recycled paper gift boxes.

name: Sterling Silver Post Earrings :  Paisley Puddles
description:
Simple everyday Sterling Silver studs with a Paisley imprint.

Made of eco friendly recycled silver, these little organic droplets have been textured, and oxidized and polished, leaving blackened silver in the recesses to highlight the design.

Approximately 6mm. 

Sterling Silver posts. Sterling wing nuts.

name: Sterling Silver Cuff Bracelet : Bar None
description:
Simplicity is found in this lightly oxidized sterling silver cuff. Buffed to a high shine to highlight the light pattern around the edges while the rounded center gleams.

Oval shape for a natural fit. 

The width of this cuff is approximately 5.4mm.

Choose your preferred size (leave in Notes when you check out)
Small - Medium is a 5.5" cuff with an opening slightly under an inch
Medium - Large is a 6" cuff with an opening of about an inch

My cuffs are made to order. Please allow 3-5 business days for your custom piece to ship.

name: Sterling Silver Cuff Bracelet : Leaves
description:
Gorgeous Leaf pattern cuff oxidized and polished to accentuate the texture and design.

Oval shape for a natural fit. 

The width of this cuff is approximately 4mm.

Choose your preferred size:
Small - Medium is a 5.5" cuff with an opening slightly under an inch
Medium - Large is a 6" cuff with an opening of about an inch

My cuffs are made to order. Please allow 3-5 business days for your custom piece to ship.

name: Pink Tourmaline Necklace : Pretty in Pink
description:
Fabulous Pink Tourmaline gemstones are wrapped in sterling silver and attached to a dainty sterling silver oval cable chain. 2 little droplets of juicy Spinel finish each end of stones. Shaded hues of pink offer a spectrum of color.

All of the metal has been oxidized to add contrast to the stones that dance to their own tune.

This romantic little necklace is 17 inches long and hangs just to the collar bone. Closes with a sterling lobster clasp.


All Mossy Creek jewelry is packaged in eco-friendly, recycled paper gift boxes.

name: Turquoise Ring : Boho Luxe
description:
~ Size 9 ~

This simplistic ring features an aqua blue Turquoise stone with black spider web matrix. Set in a fine silver bezel with serrated edges, the texture continues on the sterling silver hammered band with a stamped pattern. Lots of character in this minimalist design.

The stone and setting measure approximately 12x16mm. The band is 1.5mm.
